Reviews.Title: “Most Awful Hotel I've Ever Stayed In”

Reviews.Content: reading reviews site booked night stop rome arrival staff unfriendly unhelpful girl downright rude shown twin despite booking double ignored request change stench unbelievable ensuite actually wetroom consisting broken shower head positioned toilet built corner partitioned plastic folding door hanging hinges bathroom disgustingly filthy cleaner pour bleach bathroom floor claimed job air conditioning didnt noise outside impossible window decent nights sleep sheets bed dirty crinkled hadnt changed previous guests flimsy door hole paying 50 euros night werent expecting frills disgusting smelly filthy reccomend stay million
